forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy skies with more rain likely overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
